+ Clefdraki

Clefdraki is the ship between Clef and Kondraki.

++ Canon

Clef and Kondraki interact frequently in canon. The two are coworkers within the Foundation. Many missions feature the two interacting sometimes as rivals or as friends. Kondraki suggests he has known of Clef's existence for at least a millennium. Clef expresses great fondness over Kondraki, as he stays close to him. Mission Sarkic Breakout features the two exchanging a kiss, but this has often been dismissed as comradery.  

++ Fanon

Despite its popularity, Clef/Kondraki has faced significant backlash, primarily due to the fact that the ship romanticizes toxic relationship dynamics.  A popular fan theory suggests that Clef is the source of Kondraki‚Äôs psychological trauma, using mind powers to manipulate and torture him. While this remains unconfirmed within canon, many fans consider it plausible. Another popular theory proposes Clef and Kondraki have been dead for 20 years, and the entire events of //Crumbling Foundation// were dreamt up by Meri when she fell under a coma.

Some people also view their sloppy make out scene as something more familiar, rather than romantical.


+ Trivia

* There is currently 260 + works of the two on AO3.
